Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries

This package implements various rationale queries (find entity, find overrides, etc.) that are accessed via the pull-down menu on the RationaleExplorer.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
CommonArgument A CommonArgument defines a record displayed on the common argument display.
CommonArgumentDisplay The common argument display class displays a table of common arguments.
EditEntity This display is used to select a rationale entity to edit.
FindCommonArguments This display lets the user select which type of argument they want to display a list of most common arguments for.
FindEntity Used to select which kind of entity the user wants to see a list of.
FindImportanceOverrides This display shows all the different arguments (arguments, claims) where their default importance has been overriden.
FindRequirements Used to find out what type of requirement status the user is interested in when they use the "Find Requirements" query option.
FindStatusOverrides Displays the list of overriden status messages.
HistoryDisplay Displays a table with the history for a specific rationale element.
RequirementRelationshipDisplay Used to display any alternatives that refer to a specific requirement.
RequirementStatusDisplay The Requirement Status Display shows a list of requirements with a particular status value (violated, addressed, etc.) and the alternatives that have that relationship with them.
 

Package edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.queries Description

This package implements various rationale queries (find entity, find overrides, etc.) that are accessed via the pull-down menu on the RationaleExplorer.
